approveCompletion(uint256).details: Only callable by creator when status is PENDING_REVIEWTransfers bounty minus fees to claimer

cancelQuest(uint256).details: Only callable by creator when status is OPEN

claimQuestWithReferral(uint256,address).details: Sets permanent referrer for claimer if not already set

createQuest(string,string,uint256,string.details: Requires caller to have staked >= MIN_STAKE_AMOUNTTransfers bountyAmount + CREATION_FEE from caller

params.bountyAmount: USDC amount for bounty (6 decimals, min 1 USDC)
params.title: Quest title (max 100 chars)

returns.questId: The ID of the created quest (ERC721 tokenId)

reclaimQuest(uint256).details: Resets quest to OPEN status if claimer hasn't submitted

rejectCompletion(uint256,string).details: Only callable by creator when status is PENDING_REVIEWResets status to CLAIMED, claimer can resubmit

submitResult(uint256,string).details: Only callable by claimer when status is CLAIMED

params.resultURI: IPFS/Arweave URI pointing to the work result

unstake(uint256).details: Cannot unstake below MIN_STAKE if user has active quests

approveCompletion(uint256).notice: Approve completed work and release payment

cancelQuest(uint256).notice: Cancel an open quest and refund bounty

claimQuest(uint256).notice: Claim an open quest to work on it

claimQuestWithReferral(uint256,address).notice: Claim an open quest with a referral

createQuest(string,string,uint256,string.notice: Create a new quest with USDC bounty

reclaimQuest(uint256).notice: Reclaim a quest after claim timeout (24 hours)

stake(uint256).notice: Stake USDC to enable quest creation
